text: Ezɨ Kinia Amalekian boroghɨn iti. Ezɨ Sol akar gavgavim me bagha anemaga ghaze, “Ia Amalekia ategh mangɨ danganir igharazitamɨn ikɨ. Puvatɨghtɨ, e mangɨ me mɨsoghtɨ ia me sara arɨghiregham. En inazir afeziaba fomɨra Isip ategha azenan izir dughiamɨn, ian inazir afeziaba deraghavɨra Israelia e gami. Kɨ ian inazir afeziabagh nɨghnigha ia bagha akam amadi. Kamaghɨn, ia arɨghiram kɨ aghua.” Ezɨ Kinian gumazamiziba kamaghɨn oregha Amalekia ategha ghue.
